event.description: Felipe Lopez grounds out, first baseman Adrian Gonzalez to pitcher Chris Young.
Augie Ojeda grounds out, shortstop Chris Burke to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Justin Upton strikes out swinging.
Mark Reynolds pops out to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Josh Whitesell flies out to center fielder Jody Gerut.
Conor Jackson doubles (4) on a fly ball to right fielder Brian Giles.
Eric Byrnes flies out to center fielder Jody Gerut.
Chris Snyder singles on a pop up to shortstop Chris Burke.
Dan Haren doubles (2) on a ground ball to left fielder Scott Hairston. Chris Snyder scores. Dan Haren advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by shortstop Chris Burke.
Felipe Lopez out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Jody Gerut. Dan Haren scores.
Augie Ojeda walks.
Justin Upton singles on a line drive to right fielder Brian Giles. Augie Ojeda to 2nd.
Mark Reynolds strikes out swinging.
Josh Whitesell flies out to left fielder Scott Hairston.
Conor Jackson lines out to right fielder Brian Giles.
Eric Byrnes strikes out swinging.
Chris Snyder called out on strikes.
Dan Haren lines out to right fielder Brian Giles.
Felipe Lopez flies out to left fielder Scott Hairston.
Augie Ojeda lines out to right fielder Brian Giles.
Justin Upton doubles (5) on a line drive to left fielder Scott Hairston.
Mark Reynolds strikes out swinging.
With Josh Whitesell batting, Justin Upton steals (2) 3rd base.
Josh Whitesell walks.
Conor Jackson walks. Josh Whitesell to 2nd.
Eric Byrnes out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Jody Gerut. Justin Upton scores. Josh Whitesell to 3rd. Conor Jackson to 2nd on the throw.
Chris Young intentionally walks Chris Snyder.
Dan Haren strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Edwin Moreno replaces Chris Young, batting 9th, replacing Luis Antonio Rodriguez.
Felipe Lopez walks.
Augie Ojeda out on a sacrifice bunt, catcher Nick Hundley to second baseman Edgar Gonzalez. Felipe Lopez to 2nd.
Justin Upton walks.
Pitching Change: Luke Gregerson replaces Edwin Moreno, batting 9th.
Mark Reynolds called out on strikes.
Josh Whitesell grounds out to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Conor Jackson called out on strikes.
Eric Byrnes lines out to right fielder Brian Giles.
Chris Snyder lines out to pitcher Luke Gregerson.
Pitching Change: Heath Bell replaces Luke Gregerson, batting 9th, replacing Chase Headley.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Chad Tracy replaces Scott Schoeneweis.
Chad Tracy lines out, pitcher Heath Bell to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Felipe Lopez called out on strikes.
Augie Ojeda grounds out, third baseman Kevin Kouzmanoff to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Pitching Change: Cla Meredith replaces Heath Bell, batting 2nd, replacing second baseman Edgar Gonzalez.
Defensive Substitution: David Eckstein replaces pitcher Heath Bell, batting 9th, playing second base.
Justin Upton lines out to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Mark Reynolds strikes out swinging.
Josh Whitesell grounds out, second baseman David Eckstein to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.

Edgar Gonzalez pops out to shortstop Augie Ojeda.

Brian Giles flies out to right fielder Justin Upton.
Edgar Gonzalez strikes out swinging.
Scott Hairston pops out to first baseman Josh Whitesell in foul territory.
Adrian Gonzalez singles on a line drive to center fielder Eric Byrnes.
Jody Gerut strikes out swinging.
Kevin Kouzmanoff grounds into a force out, shortstop Augie Ojeda to second baseman Felipe Lopez. Adrian Gonzalez out at 2nd.
Nick Hundley lines out to second baseman Felipe Lopez.
Chris Burke grounds out, shortstop Augie Ojeda to first baseman Josh Whitesell.
Chris Young walks.
Brian Giles singles on a ground ball to center fielder Eric Byrnes. Chris Young to 3rd.
Edgar Gonzalez singles on a line drive to left fielder Conor Jackson. Chris Young scores. Brian Giles to 3rd.

Pitching Change: Juan Gutierrez replaces Dan Haren, batting 9th.
Edgar Gonzalez flies out to center fielder Eric Byrnes.
Scott Hairston flies out to center fielder Eric Byrnes.
Adrian Gonzalez strikes out swinging.
Jody Gerut singles on a ground ball to shortstop Augie Ojeda, deflected by third baseman Mark Reynolds.
Kevin Kouzmanoff singles on a line drive to left fielder Conor Jackson. Jody Gerut to 2nd.
Nick Hundley ground bunts into a force out, pitcher Juan Gutierrez to third baseman Mark Reynolds. Jody Gerut out at 3rd. Kevin Kouzmanoff to 2nd. Nick Hundley to 1st.
Chris Burke strikes out swinging.
